items.name: Heroic Inspiration
items.entry: You gain {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB} when you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} and whenever the DM has you roll Initiative.

items.name: Temporary Hit Points
items.entry: You gain a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to 10 times your level when you gain this blessing and when you gain a level.

reward.name: Charm of Cozmioko's Glory
entries: This charm infuses you with the righteous vengeance of the brass dragon Cozmioko. You can use it as a {@action Magic|XPHB} action and choose one of the following effects:

items.name: Cozmioko's Fire
items.entry: You cast the {@spell Wall of Fire|XPHB} spell (level 7 version, spell save {@dc 20}), requiring no spell components.

items.name: Cozmioko's Revenge
items.entry: One Melee weapon you are holding is infused with supernatural might for 1 minute or until you aren't holding the weapon. Once per turn, when you hit a Dragon with this weapon, the Dragon takes an extra {@dice 3d6} damage of the weapon's type.

entries: Once you use the charm, it vanishes from you.
